welcome.description: Create a wallet to send and receive money with friends using cryptocurrency.
welcome.title: Welcome

pinSetup.chooseSubtitle: Enter a 6-digit PIN to access your mobile wallet
pinSetup.lockedSubtitle: To protect your information, access has been locked for 5 minutes. Try again later.

confirm.title: Confirm Your Mnemonic Phrase
confirm.alertErrorMessage: You’ve selected the wrong mnemonic phrase. Please reread your phrase, write it down, and try again.
confirm.alertConfirmMessage: If you lose your recovery phrase, there is no possible way to recover your account.
confirm.alertConfirmUnderstand: Yes, I understand the risk of losing my recovery phrase.

write.description: You’ll need this phrase to access your account on another device.
write.title: Write Down Your Mnemonic Phrase
write.alertMessage: Be careful where you paste your phrase. Your wallet is only as secure as the place you store your phrase.
write.alertUnderstand: Yes, I understand the risk of storing my phrase online.

ready.title:
Your wallet 
 is ready!
ready.description: Send, receive, and store your coins.

addFunds.title: Transfer from External Wallet
addFunds.subtitle: Use the following address to transfer MOBI or XLM to your wallet.

loadingView.errorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try again.
loadingView.title: Loading

amountForm.alertText: You have only {{balance}} {{asset}} on your balance. Please, change amount for transfer.

addressForm.permissionsConfirmTitle: Allow Mobius to take pictures and record video?

error.title: Failed!
error.defaultMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.

recovery.description: Enter your mnemonic phrase to restore your wallet.
recovery.mnemonicFieldPlaceholder: Type out exactly as it’s written
recovery.title: Recover Your Account
recovery.infoAlertText: When you create a new wallet you’re asked to write down a text phrase that can be used here to restore your wallet. Unfortunately without your phrase there’s no way to restore your wallet.

hackathonVote.notice: You must have at least 5,000 MOBI to vote for the Global Hackathon Community Prize!
hackathonVote.title: Global Hackathon Vote
hackathonVote.description: Vote for your favorite DApp below. You need 5,000 MOBI to vote for the Global Hackathon Community Prize. You may only vote once. Press submit to cast your vote.
hackathonVote.success: You've just vote! Votes will be counted on October 14, 2018 at 11:59:59pm PST. Your account must have at least 5,000 MOBI that time or your vote will not be counted.
